com.boun.nine.service.interfaces

Class ConnectedService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boun.nine.service.interfaces.ConnectedService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommentResource, ConcertResource, UserResource

    public abstract class ConnectedService
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource classes are inherited from this abstract class to provide themselves SQL connection capability. All the SQL related operations are managed in this class.
    Since:
    15-05-2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ffguven

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectedService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeConnections()
      Can be used to close SQL database connections.
      static java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
      Stands for managing SELECT jobs on database.
      int executeUpdate(java.lang.String query)
      Stands for managing INSERT jobs on database or the jobs that is change the state of database

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectedService

        public ConnectedService()

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public static java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Stands for managing SELECT jobs on database. SQL query should be prepared well before sending to this function.
        Parameters:
        query - An ordinary working SQL query
        Returns:
        ResultSet The response that is obtained from SQL database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • executeUpdate

        public int executeUpdate(java.lang.String query)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Stands for managing INSERT jobs on database or the jobs that is change the state of database
        Parameters:
        query - An ordinary working SQL query
        Returns:
        int If this is equal to a value other than 0, then everything is OK, else there are some problems on query.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • closeConnections

        public static void closeConnections()
        Can be used to close SQL database connections.
